ChainGurians Short & Long Game Award Season 2

Award Description
How to be Eligible for the ChainGurians NFT Whitelist Award Season 2 ?
Each Player in the Top 10 of the Leaderboard at the end of every Short & Long Forecast Game Season, will receive an Award and a spot for the ChainGurians NFT Whitelist.


PLAY & EARN XP with "SHORT & LONG" forecast game!
This section of the dApp is fun ➕ fair competition ➕ training to improve your skills in TechnicalAnalysis and FundamentalAnalysis.

Step1) Go to chainguru.app and Connect Your Wallet (Web3)

Step2) Create your Profile - Set your Username & Customize your Avatar 
             ( Username = Soonaverse Username)

Step3) Compete with other ChainGurians in our seasonal forecast challenges,
every forecast you can gain XP points to enlighten your inner guru.

READY to GO
Every 24hrs you can set 7 forecasts on whichever cryptocurrency of preference and
escalate the leaderboard, the more skilled you are, more bonus points you get.

Enjoy playing the Short&Long forecast game!

For more Info about the Game visit us on Twitter @chainguru
